DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of dutogliptin in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Dutogliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Receiving Background Treatment With Glimepiride Alone or in Combination With Metformin or With Pioglitazone Alone
DOC.criteria: Have successfully completed all required visits of a qualifying Phase 3 core protocol Be currently receiving treatment for T2DM as set forth in the qualifying Phase 3 core protocol Any condition, disease, disorder or clinically relevant laboratory abnormality which, in the opinion of the investigator, would jeopardize the patient's appropriate participation in this study or obscure the effects of treatment
